data.title: Best Movies Like Naked Massacre
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Naked Massacre: Delirium (1979), Star of David: Beauty Hunting (1979), Demented (1980), Fear (1983), Nathalie: Escape from Hell (1978), Violated Angels (1967), Too Scared to Scream (1984), Don't Answer the Phone! (1980), Huff (2013), Visiting Hours (1982)
